${modID}:BurningStrike.NAME: Burning Strike
${modID}:BurningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If ${modID}:Chain is at least 2, deal !M! additional damage.

${modID}:ShiningStrike.NAME: Shining Strike
${modID}:ShiningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If ${modID}:Tactics_Level is at least 2, deal !M! additional damage.

${modID}:Heliotrope.NAME: Heliotrope
${modID}:Heliotrope.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for each ${modID}:Material in your bag.

${modID}:MilkyWay.NAME: Milky Way
${modID}:MilkyWay.DESCRIPTION: For each ${modID}:Material you gather, gain 1 Strength.

${modID}:EssenceOfAlchemy.NAME: Essence of Alchemy
${modID}:EssenceOfAlchemy.DESCRIPTION: Every turn, the first ${modID}:Craft you play will be played twice.

${modID}:MagmaPowder.NAME: Magma Powder
${modID}:MagmaPowder.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gunpowder. Crushed lava ore in a powdered form.

${modID}:HeavenlyString.NAME: Heavenly String
${modID}:HeavenlyString.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magical. A pure white thread reminiscent of angel feathers.

${modID}:LuckyClover.NAME: Lucky Clover
${modID}:LuckyClover.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Flowers. As an alchemy ingredient, it doesn't really matter how many leaves there are.

${modID}:TemptingSap.NAME: Tempting Sap
${modID}:TemptingSap.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Poisons. A dangerous sap that can melt absolutely anything.

${modID}:FluffyWool.NAME: Fluffy Wool
${modID}:FluffyWool.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Thread. A useful material gathered from sheep-type monsters.

${modID}:MossyDriftwood.NAME: Mossy Driftwood
${modID}:MossyDriftwood.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Lumber. A log completely covered in moss.

${modID}:WitchsPotion.NAME: Witch's Potion
${modID}:WitchsPotion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and inflict 2 Vulnerable and 2 Weak.

${modID}:DemonicPotion.NAME: Demonic Potion
${modID}:DemonicPotion.DESCRIPTION: Inflict Slow, Weaken, and Vulnerable on enemy.

${modID}:Initiator.NAME: Initiator
${modID}:Initiator.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. Lose !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. Exhaust.

${modID}:EfficientGathering.NAME: Efficient Gathering
${modID}:EfficientGathering.DESCRIPTION: Gather 1 random ${modID}:Material at the start of your turn.

${modID}:PhotonQuasar.NAME: Photon Quasar
${modID}:PhotonQuasar.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. Add 1 Void to discard.

${modID}:ShiningTrail.NAME: Shining Trail
${modID}:ShiningTrail.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, add 1 ${modID}:Star to hand.

${modID}:IntelligentDesign.NAME: Intelligent Design
${modID}:IntelligentDesign.DESCRIPTION: Return all used ${modID}:Crafts this battle to your hand. Exhaust.

${modID}:RyzaSmash.NAME: Ryza Smash
${modID}:RyzaSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each level of your ${modID}:Tactics.

${modID}:CoreRecycle.NAME: Core Recycle
${modID}:CoreRecycle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills an enemy, gain [E] [E] and draw 1 card.

${modID}:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
${modID}:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card. Exhaust.

${modID}:Scatterbrained.NAME: Scatterbrained
${modID}:Scatterbrained.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 ${modID}:Creativity and draw 2 cards at the start of every turn.

${modID}:AlchemistForm.NAME: Alchemist Form
${modID}:AlchemistForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Creativity at the start of every turn.

${modID}:AlternateApproach.NAME: Alternate Approach
${modID}:AlternateApproach.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 ${modID}:Creativity for each ${modID}:Material in your bag. Discard all ${modID}:Materials.

${modID}:CarefulPlanning.NAME: Careful Planning
${modID}:CarefulPlanning.DESCRIPTION: The next ${modID}:Synthesis will return a random ${modID}:Material.

${modID}:LightningReflex.NAME: Lightning Reflex
${modID}:LightningReflex.DESCRIPTION: Double the amount of ${modID}:Chain you gain.
${modID}:LightningReflex.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Double the amount of ${modID}:Chain you gain.

${modID}:Decomposition.NAME: Decomposition
${modID}:Decomposition.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable for every level of ${modID}:Tactics.

${modID}:MoonPulsar.NAME: Moon Pulsar
${modID}:MoonPulsar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies !M! times.

${modID}:SouthernCross.NAME: Southern Cross
${modID}:SouthernCross.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deal !D! extra damage if there is only one enemy.

${modID}:ShiningBlast.NAME: Shining Blast
${modID}:ShiningBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain 1 ${modID}:Lightning_Element for every enemy. Exhaust.

${modID}:StrategicOnslaught.NAME: Strategic Onslaught
${modID}:StrategicOnslaught.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each level of ${modID}:Tactics. Exhaust.
${modID}:StrategicOnslaught.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each level of ${modID}:Tactics.

${modID}:Mindfulness.NAME: Mindfulness
${modID}:Mindfulness.DESCRIPTION: Your ${modID}:Tactics_Level will no longer reset every turn.

${modID}:CrescentSweep.NAME: Crescent Sweep
${modID}:CrescentSweep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies, but damage decreases by 3 to each subsequent enemy.
